website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward TOEFL study guide designed for beginners and advanced students alike.
pros: The book offers a broad overview of the TOEFL test while focusing on several important components to study
Practice tests give a good preview of what to expect on the real thing
cons: Limited practice tests do not give much practice compared to other TOEFL books available

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE - NO AUDIO FOR KINDLE VERSION
customer_reviews.text: Very deceiving that this book is sold WITHOUT the audio. Why would anyone want to purchase a book with LISTENING exercises without the audio files? In the beginning, it says that you can click on an icon to access the audio files, but it didn't work for me. This is very upsetting!!!
customer_reviews.author: CND

customer_reviews.title: This book is amazing it gives you an idea of what to expect
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing it gives you an idea of what to expect. I'll take the test next week and will update my review then. I tested 2 days ago and the examples in the book have the same structure as in the actual test. The reading part is 20 min. for each passage and the answers. Speaking was excactly the same which gives you good practice opportunities. Listening...I have to say they speak faster than on the CD. And the writing were the same. All in all this book is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not the best way of rating your english knowledge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to have the latest updates on questions in the toefl exam but still the exam had more complicated questions especially in the speaking section. Also it is not helping with the listening. The questions in the real exam are soooo shrewed and tricky that even understaning 100% of what you listening won’t help. Toefl is an exam to make you make a mistake. It is not the best way of rating your english knowledge. This book also is not helping that much.
customer_reviews.author: sohrab

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this e-book from Amazon! It does NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this e-book from Amazon! It does NOT came with the downloadable content. This was very upsetting. I got in touch with Amazon to try to receive the content, but they put me in touch with an ETS assistant, who explained that since I purchased it from Amazon, there was nothing she could do. I'm asking for a refund now.
customer_reviews.author: Helio

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been studying for the TOEFL for two weeks and this book has been helping me a lot + only tests
customer_reviews.author: Vitoria S O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Book!
customer_reviews.text: I use this text with my TOEFL students and it is an outstanding resource! Buy this book as well as the previous edition in order to improve your score. Great job ETS! I hope you publish another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M

customer_reviews.title: Comes with disc & practice test
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using it as much but that's not because the book & disc aren't good. If you have the discipline, you can absolutely improve your English skills. Also, if you sign up for community college for classes, the instructor will ask you to get this material.
customer_reviews.author: Blore

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Old sample test exercises!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book edition because I thought it would have the updated changes they did on the test. However, it has a page at the beginning stating the changes and the actual book has the old TOEFL test samples. It's very confusing. If I had known this, I would have bought a cheaper edition and just checked the changes on the test online. If I find a cheaper edition I'll definitely return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: This book really prepares you for the TOEFL test
customer_reviews.text: I took the TOEFL test about a week ago, and I’m pretty satisfied with the results. I must say this book helped me a lot and the practices were similar to the real test. Also, I would recommend that if you have free time, you can look for extra practice on Magoosh’s youtube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of time!
customer_reviews.text: This version lacks the "downloadable" tests that the site advertises. I assumed the Kindle version would have some sort of code or URL for downloading the audio files for at least the Listening and Speaking tests. However, this book gives you only the physical test questions (and reading passages), not the audio. If you buy this version, you're screwed, as Amazon's window for return for a digital order is less than 10 days. Save your money and buy the physical copy with the DVD. This aspect of the text is a pity, for those of us who want to avoid storing more books or who want to minimize our use of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowlees Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Textbook is good! Separate 4 section (Reading
customer_reviews.text: Textbook is good! Separate 4 section (Reading, Whiting, Listening and Speaking) it is useful for study TOEFL. However, I couldn’t watch DVD-ROM with Mac-PC...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just wanted the CD. Well... all ...
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted the CD. Well... all i can say is what they offer on CD is so much easier then the test itself. The listening section is brutal on the actual exam- YOU DO HAVE TO TAKE NOTES!. Buy the Princeton review instead.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't use DVD
customer_reviews.text: I returned it as the DVD wasnt working. Also, it was not easy to learn with it. I prefer the online version.
customer_reviews.author: @inacincinnis

customer_reviews.title: Very good for high-intermediate ESL students
customer_reviews.text: Very good guide for high-intermediate to low-advanced ESL students. The first 220 pages explain how the TOEFL exam works and from page 221 on there are practice exercises.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barros

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to study
customer_reviews.text: I got 90 on the test in 2018! It was a really good way to study for toefl and the cd comes with a simulation of a Test. And it was the same on my RealTOEFL test.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy_Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for preparing the TOFEL test.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good choice for preparing TOEFL test. For me, I use this book to check the requirements to attain to the level of a TOEFL test. Because I need to improve my English.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to understand Toefl for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you are a beginner, like me, then this book provides every particular information that you need to know about the Toefl and guides you through every section. You can use the Cd provided with this book, if not you can still practice those questions in the book. I thoroughly read the book as well as some other resources and needless to say I got great marks in the examination. Wishing all the Toefl takers the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cracking the TOEFL is a MUCH MORE USEFUL book than this for the preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: New, larger volume.
customer_reviews.text: This has become a big, thick book like an SAT guide. 4 full tests. A good deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but helpful
customer_reviews.text: big book. lots of info. Really helpful to prepare yourself at home.
customer_reviews.author: adriantorres89

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This book was very helpful. I have prepared for a week and passed pretty good . Step by step Toefl preparation with practice tests. Unfortunately couldn’t used disc because I don’t have dvd-rom but I still give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: KristinaZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. It’s like being in TOEFL exam
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. It’s like being in TOEFL exam. However the practice can be like 45 to 50 minutes but the actual TOEFL test will be 80 minutes. It was worth it every dólar I paid lol.
customer_reviews.author: Analtina Felix

customer_reviews.title: Package Seal Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product ok, but package seal broken and scotch tape put instead. Who’s responsible for this? How can we trust our items are properly managed in times like this?
customer_reviews.author: Celia Casado

customer_reviews.title: NO DVD WITH AUDIO
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY KINDLE VERSION AS IT DOESNOT COME WITH THE DVD CONTENT. THE BOOK IS INCOMPLETE WITHOUT IT
customer_reviews.author: ankita Gummadi

customer_reviews.title: Defective CD
customer_reviews.text: My CD is not working, therefore I’m unable to study listening and other integrated tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Armar Noorussaad

customer_reviews.title: Good for who's studying alone
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice book, with tests and exercises. Its come with a CD room that is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: micheli machado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect book with CD , everything is good ,the listening part is ok . I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: NO CD
customer_reviews.text: HI, i bought this book couples months ago, didnt open the book until today, and i found out there is no CD!!! :( HELP!
customer_reviews.author: K Ar

customer_reviews.title: It gives a good base of how the Toefl is. Really good.
customer_reviews.text: Helpful book that make me have a bigger grade then I needed! Really good.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful, it'll give you an idea of the format.
customer_reviews.author: Alba De Jesús

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Where's the Audio, AMAZON?? How it is possible to sell without the Audios??? The book doens't Work.
customer_reviews.author: carolina

customer_reviews.title: Helpful tool for TOEFL test
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to prepare for the test. It has many examples to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Alicia Martinez Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect, this give you a reality of how the exam is, and give you a lot of tips of how to make more easier the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Meraz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Exam Material
customer_reviews.text: Must have book for your TOEFL iBT, Authentic tests gives u an idea what to expect!
customer_reviews.author: Irakli

customer_reviews.title: Basic but practical, with examples.
customer_reviews.text: Basic for the TOEFL tests. From this book, I went further about specific topics and researched about academic knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Taehoon

customer_reviews.title: Ready for my TOEFL test
customer_reviews.text: It’s really helped me a lot to study for the test. The cd with the Audios will help you to improve your listening tons
customer_reviews.author: Anamora

customer_reviews.title: can't open the DVD
customer_reviews.text: I use the portable DVD driver to read the DVD from this book,but I can't open it. Do I need to install some driver?
customer_reviews.author: helen m.

customer_reviews.title: Little hole and a dirty stain
customer_reviews.text: I has a little hole and a dirty stain. My recommendation is to be careful at the moment of make the package.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Salguero

customer_reviews.title: It arrives really fast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, it's a really huge book and It came with the cd too.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for someone and it did the trick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and it did the trick
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: DVD doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The dvd doesn’t work and you need it for every single section but reading
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Audio files
customer_reviews.text: The kindle version doesn't come with the audio files! so upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Cover Book Damage
customer_reviews.text: The back cover book was broken. Bad, because is a new product
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is exactly what I was looking for. However, the packaging was subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew lowe

customer_reviews.title: TOEFL book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book and it's really helpful. I bought it to prepare for TOEFL in next year and it was fast express and good quality. In word, it worths to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for a friend. I hope she does like it.
customer_reviews.author: berny c.

product_meta.title: The Official Guide to the TOEFL Test with DVD-ROM, Fifth Edition
